opportunities.issue: Body content length is below 100 characters
opportunities.seoRecommendation: Add more meaningful content to the page

opportunities.issue: Found Lorem ipsum placeholder text in the page content
opportunities.seoRecommendation: Replace placeholder text with meaningful content

opportunities.issue: No H1 tag found on the page
opportunities.seoRecommendation: Use exactly one H1 tag per page for better SEO structure

opportunities.issue: The canonical URL should point to itself to indicate that it is the preferred version of the content.
opportunities.seoRecommendation: The canonical URL should point to itself to indicate that it is the preferred version of the content.

issue.seoRecommendation: Fix or remove broken links to improve user experience and SEO
Fix or remove broken links to improve user experience

issue.issue: Link using HTTP instead of HTTPS
issue.seoRecommendation: Update all links to use HTTPS protocol
